QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct cast(replace(n.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, case when n.encid = '' or n.encid is null then NULL else cast(replace(n.encid, 'E000','') as bigint) end as VisitOccurrenceId, n.note_date, 'sds_term:' + isnull(n.sds_term, '') + 'sds_location:' + isnull(n.sds_location, '') + 'sds_family_member:' + isnull(n.sds_family_member, '') + ';sds_sentiment:' + isnull(n.sds_sentiment, '') as note_text, 'NLP_SDS_FAMILY' as note_title, n.note_section, 40639387 as language_concept_id from {sc}.nlp_sds_family n JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND n.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by cast(replace(n.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
